properties.author: Alex Karasulu
properties.title: Apache Directory Project: X.500 and LDAP Support

section.name: X.500 Vs. LDAP Overview
section.p: There really is not much to this for now. LDAP is the focus although X.500 is not far behind. Expect to find here those things describing the differences between the two and how the server accomodates both protocols.

section.name: LDAP Support
section.p: The first release of the server will predominantly be for LDAP. There may be X.500 hooks or features that are supported however the primary focus initially is LDAP.

section.name: X.500 Support
section.p: As we add more X.500 directory modules and functionality we will grow this section.
